duration.Description: Time between the start of medetomidine administration and the experimental endpoint (for details, see paper)

efs_runs.LongName: Number of electrical forepaw stimulaiton (EFS) fMRI runs

protocol.Description: subcutaneous (SC) or intravenous (IV), with or without bolus

rs_runs.LongName: Number of resting state (RS) fMRI runs

weight.Description: Weight was measured right before the induction of anesthesia

participant_id.Description: ID of the rat, from sub-01 to sub-24
